{"id":527495292,"lang":"cpp","time":"7 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1627128812,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/527495292/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Trapping Rain Water","memory":"14.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int trap(vector<int>& h) {\n        int n=h.size();\n        if(n==0) return 0;\n        int l[n],r[n],ans=0;\n        l[0]=h[0];\n        r[n-1]=h[n-1];\n        for(int i=1;i<n;i++)l[i]=max(h[i],l[i-1]);\n        for(int i=n-2;i>=0;i--)r[i]=max(h[i],r[i+1]);\n        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)ans+=min(l[i],r[i])-h[i];\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"trapping-rain-water"}
